description: This file contains code to generate C++ source code for JSON-RPC server implementation, including registration, unregistration, and event emission functions, based on schema definitions. It defines functions that generate code for method registration, event handling, and versioning, within specified namespaces.

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A utility class used within code generation for appending tests (likely code snippets or conditions) during code emission.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code to emit a JSON-RPC event, including its prototype, parameter handling, and call logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates header code, includes, and namespace declarations for the RPC source file.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespace blocks after code generation.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the main code for registering, unregistering, and event handling in the RPC implementation.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: High-level function to generate full RPC source code, including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates versioning code and wraps it with namespace declarations.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
